project_title.title: Project_Title
project_title.description: The title of the research call and/or partnership

co_funder_s.title: Co_funders
co_funder_s.description: Partners also providing any amount of funding.

project_status.title: Project_Status
project_status.description:
Indicates the current research activity status of the partnership. Values can include: NIHR_Active , NIHR_Complete.
NIHR_Active - A project/award that is active. Centre and/or project team has confirmed the project has started and the contract end date has not passed.
NIHR_Complete - The end date of the contract has passed, the draft final report has been received (if relevant to award) and the final report is undergoing editorial review (if relevant to the award)

programme.title: Programme
programme.description: Name of the partnership that the call is funded by.

programme_stream.title: Programme_Stream
programme_stream.description: An identifier of a sub-programme or stream of work as defined by the Buisness Unit. Values can include: commissioned, researcher led, trainee development

award_amount.title: Award_Amount
award_amount.description: The current  award amount, including any contract variations

start_date.title: Start_Date
start_date.description: Latest date of signatory on the Memorandum of Understanding, Grant Agreement or Contract.

end_date.title: End_Date
end_date.description: The end date by which all grant funded activities must be finished.

description.title: Description
description.description: Summary describing the research call and/or partnership.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: Objectives of the research call and/or partnership.

organisation_type.title: Organisation_Type
organisation_type.description:
The type of category of organisation [IATI].
Government
Local Government
Other Public Sector - Any local (sub national) government organisation in either donor or recipient country.
International NGO
National NGO
Regional NGO
Partner Country based NGO
Public Private Partnership - Local and National NGO / CSO based in aid/assistance recipient country
Multilateral
Foundation
Private Sector
Private Sector in Provider Country
Private Sector in Aid Recipient Country - Is in provider / donor country.
Private Sector in Third Country - Is in aid recipient country.
Academic, Training and Research - Is not in either a donor or aid recipient country.
Other

contracted_organisation.title: Contracted_Organisation
contracted_organisation.description: The head office of the co-funder.
